name: extension-boilerplate
author: Saiya
description: browser extension boilerplate base on vue & webpack

scripts.build:js: VUE_TEMPL_TYPE=js node_modules/.bin/vue init . extension-boilerplate-js && zip -r -X extension-boilerplate-js.zip ./extension-boilerplate-js
scripts.build:ts: VUE_TEMPL_TYPE=ts node_modules/.bin/vue init . extension-boilerplate-ts  && zip -r -X extension-boilerplate-ts.zip ./extension-boilerplate-ts
